entities.name: examination results

relationships.description: The Wizarding Examinations Authority is responsible for conducting the O.W.L. S examination.
Professor McGonagall is the head of Gryffindor house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Professor McGonagall is Harry Potter's teacher.
Aunt Petunia is Harry Potter's Muggle aunt.
The examination results will reflect on Professor McGonagall's new regime at the school.
